vexMod:DrainingDoom.NAME: Draining Doom
vexMod:DrainingDoom.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 5 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CursedBody.NAME: Cursed Body
vexMod:CursedBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Add an Injury Curse into your deck. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:CursedBody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Add a Clumsy Curse into your deck. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CleverClash.NAME: Clever Clash
vexMod:CleverClash.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

vexMod:DeadlyDodge.NAME: Deadly Dodge
vexMod:DeadlyDodge.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Intangible and Exhaust. NL Otherwise, apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.

vexMod:ReflexChannel.NAME: Reflex Channel
vexMod:ReflexChannel.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, Channel 1 Frost. NL Otherwise, Channel 1 Lightning.
vexMod:ReflexChannel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, Channel 1 Frost. NL Otherwise, Channel 1 Lightning. NL Draw 1 card.

vexMod:Fear.NAME: Fear
vexMod:Fear.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable.

vexMod:Greed.NAME: Greed
vexMod:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose 6 Gold.

vexMod:StrikeStorm.NAME: Strike Storm
vexMod:StrikeStorm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a non-Attack card, play a πStrike.
vexMod:StrikeStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, play a πStrike.

vexMod:ChaoticReactor.NAME: Chaotic Reactor
vexMod:ChaoticReactor.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! random Orb.
vexMod:ChaoticReactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, Channel !M! random Orb.

vexMod:Overload.NAME: Overload
vexMod:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 random Orb for each Orb slot you have. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 random Orb for each Orb slot you have. NL Gain !M! Orb slots. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CrumblingCrash.NAME: Crumbling Crash
vexMod:CrumblingCrash.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable.

vexMod:ComboTrick.NAME: Combo Trick
vexMod:ComboTrick.DESCRIPTION: Add a Shiv into your hand. NL Apply 3 Poison. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Discard 1 card.

vexMod:TuneUp.NAME: Tune Up
vexMod:TuneUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by !M! this combat.

vexMod:MidasTouch.NAME: Golden Touch
vexMod:MidasTouch.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, gain Gold equal to unblocked damage dealt.

vexMod:PotOfGreed.NAME: Resourcefulness
vexMod:PotOfGreed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

vexMod:Jackpot.NAME: Jackpot!
vexMod:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:Jackpot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:EntryPlan.NAME: Entry Plan
vexMod:EntryPlan.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw an Attack, deal !D! damage.

vexMod:ShockKick.NAME: Shock Kick
vexMod:ShockKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Focus.

vexMod:Taunt.NAME: Insult
vexMod:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Apply X Weak. NL Apply X Vulnerable. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X+1 Weak. NL Apply X+1 Vulnerable. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:BandageWhip.NAME: Bandage Whip
vexMod:BandageWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

vexMod:BlazeBeam.NAME: Blaze Kick
vexMod:BlazeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! stack of ANY random buff. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:BlazeBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! stacks of ANY random buff. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:ChargeBeam.NAME: Charge Beam
vexMod:ChargeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

vexMod:Devastation.NAME: Devastation
vexMod:Devastation.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:Elimination.NAME: Elimination
vexMod:Elimination.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust your hand.
vexMod:Elimination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

vexMod:FullService.NAME: Full Service
vexMod:FullService.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Block next turn. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Weak. NL Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable. NL Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison. NL Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! cards. NL Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! more cards next turn. NL Heal !vexMod:SecondMagic! HP. NL Next turn, gain 1 Energy. NL Upgrade a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:PinpointKick.NAME: Pinpoint Kick
vexMod:PinpointKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this breaks the enemy's Block, apply !M! Vulnerable.

vexMod:ShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
vexMod:ShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

vexMod:CardboardBlock.NAME: Cardboard Shield
vexMod:CardboardBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.
vexMod:CardboardBlock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile +3.

vexMod:MidnightStrike.NAME: Midnight Strike
vexMod:MidnightStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have played exactly !M! cards this combat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:BattleStance.NAME: Battle Stance
vexMod:BattleStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.

vexMod:EvasiveThoughts.NAME: Evasive Thoughts
vexMod:EvasiveThoughts.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

vexMod:GroundPound.NAME: Ground Pound
vexMod:GroundPound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:Hatred.NAME: Hatred
vexMod:Hatred.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Attack to your hand.
vexMod:Hatred.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Attack to your hand.

vexMod:Hex.NAME: Hex
vexMod:Hex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Lock-On. NL Evoke your next Orb.

vexMod:RocketPunch.NAME: Rocket Punch
vexMod:RocketPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose an Attack in your hand. NL Add a copy of that card into your discard pile.
vexMod:RocketPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose an Attack in your hand. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand.

vexMod:SharpOrbs.NAME: Sharp Orbs
vexMod:SharpOrbs.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each Channeled Orb.

vexMod:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
vexMod:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, draw 1 less card next turn.

vexMod:CoinToss.NAME: Coin Blast
vexMod:CoinToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain some Gold. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:SystemUpdate.NAME: System Update
vexMod:SystemUpdate.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Focus.

vexMod:Division.NAME: Mitosis
vexMod:Division.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Colorless card into your deck. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:Division.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random upgraded Colorless card into your deck. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:Virus.NAME: Virus
vexMod:Virus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.

vexMod:AntiqueFury.NAME: Antique Fury
vexMod:AntiqueFury.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:AntiqueFury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have.

vexMod:OrbBoomerang.NAME: Orb Boomerang
vexMod:OrbBoomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Does an additional effect based on your next Orb.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Trigger the passive ability of your next Orb.
NL Apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.

vexMod:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
vexMod:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

vexMod:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
vexMod:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

vexMod:Insult.NAME: Taunt
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Have a free shot! NL Futile weakling!

vexMod:FightResponse.NAME: Battle Rage
vexMod:FightResponse.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at or below 50% HP. NL Remove all your Debuffs. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My health is not low enough.

vexMod:Execute.NAME: Execute
vexMod:Execute.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at or below 50% HP. NL Deal !D! damage twice.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My health is not low enough.

vexMod:StairwayStrike.NAME: Spire Strike
vexMod:StairwayStrike.DESCRIPTION: Cost is always equal to your Act number. NL Deal damage equal to your floor number. NL Exhaust.
vexMod:StairwayStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cost is always equal to your Act number. NL Deal damage equal to your floor number.

vexMod:GoldenStrike.NAME: Gilded Strike
vexMod:GoldenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:InfectiousLoot.NAME: Infectious Loot
vexMod:InfectiousLoot.DESCRIPTION: Apply Poison equal to the number of Relics you have.

vexMod:CursedStrike.NAME: Cursed Strike
vexMod:CursedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random Curse into your hand.

vexMod:ScaledPoison.NAME: Scaled Poison
vexMod:ScaledPoison.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Double this card's Poison this combat.

vexMod:FocusPunch.NAME: Focus Punch
vexMod:FocusPunch.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, reduce its cost by 1. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:ShieldSwipe.NAME: Shield Swipe
vexMod:ShieldSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Steal the enemy's Block. NL Draw 1 card.

vexMod:GrowingStorm.NAME: Growing Storm
vexMod:GrowingStorm.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lightning. NL Increase the number of Lightning this card Channels by 1 this combat.

vexMod:DiverseOrb.NAME: Orb Shield
vexMod:DiverseOrb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each unique Orb you have.

vexMod:DarkConflux.NAME: Dark Conflux
vexMod:DarkConflux.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Dark. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs X times.
vexMod:DarkConflux.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Dark. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs X+1 times.

vexMod:BloodToGold.NAME: Blood to Gold
vexMod:BloodToGold.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Draw 1 card.

vexMod:GhostlyBlitz.NAME: Ghostly Blitz
vexMod:GhostlyBlitz.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of all Attacks in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CurseBlast.NAME: Curse Blast
vexMod:CurseBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this does not kill an enemy, add a random Curse into your deck.

vexMod:Weakness.NAME: Weakness
vexMod:Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, reduce the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 2 this combat.

vexMod:NamedBlast.NAME: Name Guard
vexMod:NamedBlast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each character in your name. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:CalendarSmash.NAME: Calendar Illness
vexMod:CalendarSmash.DESCRIPTION: Apply Poison equal to the day of the month. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:TrainingStrike.NAME: Training Strike
vexMod:TrainingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand or this card by !M! this combat.

vexMod:GorgonsGaze.NAME: Gorgon's Gaze
vexMod:GorgonsGaze.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, Exhaust all other cards in your hand.

vexMod:GorgonsGlare.NAME: Gorgon's Glare
vexMod:GorgonsGlare.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:EyeBeam.NAME: Eye Beam
vexMod:EyeBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:SnakeSkin.NAME: Snake's Skin
vexMod:SnakeSkin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would receive unblocked Attack damage, reduce it by !M!.

vexMod:EmailVexCard.NAME: Tweet Strike
vexMod:EmailVexCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, @DBotling tweets about it. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:StarBlast.NAME: Magic Fruit
vexMod:StarBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:Stardash.NAME: Fruity Dash
vexMod:Stardash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! [#EFC851]Magical [#EFC851]Fruit into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

vexMod:Deathsprout.NAME: Death Sprout
vexMod:Deathsprout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, add a [#EFC851]Magical [#EFC851]Fruit to your deck. NL Exhaust.
